title: categories.json
description: JSON Schema for name-suggestion-index category files

properties.description: (required) An Object containing properties for this category

path.description: (required) The path for this category in the form tree/key/value

preserveTags.description: (optional) For tags matching these patterns, NSI should not replace an existing value in OSM

skipCollection.description: (optional) If 'true', skip the step to collect new items from the OSM planet

exclude.description: (optional) Patterns to match names that should be excluded from this category

generic.description: (optional) Patterns to match generic names that should be excluded (e.g. 'restaurant', 'burger')

named.description: (optional) Patterns to match proper names to exclude from this category (e.g. 'china wok', 'pizza king')

locationSet.$comment: See location-conflation documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/rapideditor/location-conflation#readme

countryCoder.$comment: See country-coder documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/rapideditor/country-coder#readme
countryCoder.description: A country code (ISO 3166-1, United Nations M49, or anything recognized by country-coder)

circularArea.description: A circular area defined as [longitude, latitude, radius?]. If not specified, radius will default to 25km.

geojsonFilename.description: A filename for one of the custom geojson features in this project

preserveTags.description: (optional) For tags matching these patterns, NSI should not replace an existing value in OSM

notTags.description: A list of properties that we never want as tags, this is to prevent common mistakes

normalItem.description: A normal item (not a template item)

displayName.description: (required) A display name for this entry.

locationSet.$comment: See location-conflation documentation for compatible values: https://github.com/rapideditor/location-conflation#readme
locationSet.description: (required) included and excluded locations for this item

matchNames.description: (optional) An array of alternate but less-desired names.

matchTags.description: (optional) An array of alternate but less-desired tag-pairs.

preserveTags.description: (optional) For tags matching these patterns, NSI should not replace an existing value in OSM

note.description: (optional) An optional note - can contain anything about the item.

tags.$comment: Exclude properties that should appear elsewhere to avoid common mistakes
tags.description: (required) OpenStreetMap tags to associate with this item

templateItem.description: Template items get expanded into normal items when the index is built

note.description: (optional) An optional note - can contain anything about the item.

templateInclude.description: (optional) Patterns to match source item IDs to be included (if not specified, all source items are included)

templateExclude.description: (optional) Patterns to match source item IDs to be excluded (if not specified, all source items are included)

templateSource.description: (required) A tree/key/value path to use as the source of the expanded items

templateTags.$comment: Exclude properties that should appear elsewhere to avoid common mistakes
templateTags.description: (required) OpenStreetMap tags to change from the source tags
